version_description:
Thanks for using STEMpump! This update adds/fixes the following:
• Recommended grade levels per course
• Picture-in-picture video for iPad

The V2 update adds and updates the following:
• Refreshed home page
• More personalization
• Video playback support
• Full screen course pages
• New lesson pages
• STEMpump Online - Redesign
• Faster data loading
• Smarter sharing options
• Support for video-only courses
• Global visual changes
